thread.title: Never say die! A Goonies sequel is still a possibility, says director Richard Donner
thread.title_full: Never say die! A Goonies sequel is still a possibility, says director Richard Donner

title: Never say die! A Goonies sequel is still a possibility, says director Richard Donner
text: Never say die! A Goonies sequel is still a possibility, says director Richard Donner Friday, 4 September 2015 (22 minutes ago) In a new interview Goonies director Richard Donner kept the hope for a sequel alive. He noted that while it takes a long time to get it right, “maybe the powers that be are working on something.”
